1984-07-13.snippet: Bangor Punta Corp.'s subordinated debt was upgraded by Moody's to Baa-1, from B-2, because of its recent assumption by Lear Siegler Inc., Bangor Punta's parent.     * Computer Depot Inc., a personal computer systems company in Minneapolis, said it...
1984-07-13.lead_paragraph: Bangor Punta Corp.'s subordinated debt was upgraded by Moody's to Baa-1, from B-2, because of its recent assumption by Lear Siegler Inc., Bangor Punta's parent. * Computer Depot Inc., a personal computer systems company in Minneapolis, said its initial public offering of one million shares of common stock had been priced at $9 a share through Kidder, Peabody & Co.
